DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether oxytocin affect face perception
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Oxytocin on Face Perception
DOC.criteria: normal or corrected to normal vision minors pregnancy (according to a pregnancy test taken by subjects prior to participation) a history of asthma or nasal polyps cardiac disorders hyponatremia acute or chronic renal insufficiency liver cirrhosis neurological disease other chronic disease dementia, or lack of judgment
